scripts.local: yarn run generate:categories && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --hide-modules --env=local --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js
scripts.staging: yarn run generate:categories && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --hide-modules --env=staging --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js
scripts.production: yarn run generate:categories && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --hide-modules --env=production --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js
